speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about what you've observed in terms of changes in behavior or attention issues? What seemed to trigger the concern for you and your mother?

speaker: Patient
text: "It's just that I've been feeling really overwhelmed lately and it's hard for me to focus in class. I'll be sitting there, listening to the teacher, but I just can't seem to remember what's going on. My mom's been saying I've been getting really low grades and I've been snapping at her a lot, which is really embarrassing."

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the changes in behavior you've observed? Have they been sudden or gradual, and are there any specific situations or activities that seem to trigger these changes?

speaker: Patient
text: "Honestly, I feel like it's been building up over time. I used to love going to school and participating in activities, but lately, it just feels like a chore. I'll be in class, and I'll see my friends laughing and having fun, and I'll just feel left out. It's hard to explain, but it's like I'm just going through the motions."

speaker: Doctor
text: "Can you describe to me a typical day in your daily routine, including your morning and evening routines, and any activities you usually do in between? Also, have you noticed any changes in your sleep patterns or appetite?"

speaker: Patient
text: "Umm... my day usually starts early, I wake up around 6 am, get dressed, and head downstairs for breakfast with my family. We usually just grab something quick and go, I don't really have much time for anything else. Then I head off to school around 7:30 am. School's pretty busy, like I said, I just feel like I'm going through the motions, so I don't really pay attention in class as much as I used to. I usually sit with my friends, but even when we're talking, I find myself zoning out sometimes. After school, I just do my homework and stuff, then I hang out with my friends some more before dinner. We usually eat together as a family, but like I said, I'm not really feeling it lately. At night, I just go to bed around 10 pm, I don't really have any other activities, I just kind of... exist, I guess."
